name: Vinsmoke Judge
text: On Play DON!!-1: You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Play up to 4 (Germa 66) type Character cards with 4000 power or less from your trash with different names. Activate: Main Once Per Turn DON!!-1: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.

effect.text: You may trash 2 cards from your hand: Play up to 4 (Germa 66) type Character cards with 4000 power or less from your trash with different names.
Rest up to 1 of your opponent's DON!! cards.
